prerequisites.message: Please ensure your application is using instrumentation libraries that adhere strictly to the [OpenTelemetry GenAI semantic conventions v1.27.0+](https://github.com/open-telemetry/semantic-conventions/blob/v1.27.0/docs/gen-ai/gen-ai-spans.md)
"TargetingId" must be added to the GenAI spans. Detailed steps is present [here](https://github.com/microsoft/online-experimentation-metric-collections/tree/main/genai#prerequisites).
